pkgmetadata.longdescription: Learning Graphical Models with Hubs // Implements the hub graphical lasso and hub covariance graph proposal by Tan, KM., London, P., Mohan, K., Lee, S-I., Fazel, M., and Witten, D. (2014). Learning graphical models with hubs. Journal of Machine Learning Research 15(Oct):3297-3331.
